meanings.definition: A herbicide used to control weeds in crops.
meanings.sent1: Farmers apply diurons to their fields to prevent weeds from growing.
meanings.sent2: The diurons effectively eliminated the unwanted plants in the cornfield.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits tried to eat the diurons, thinking they were tasty treats!
meanings.sent4: The diurons acted like vigilant guards, protecting the crops from invasive weeds.
meanings.sent5: The diurons worked tirelessly, ensuring the crops had no competition from other plants.

meanings.definition: The plural form of diuron, a chemical compound.
meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the properties of various diurons in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The market offers different types of diurons for specific uses.
meanings.sent3: The students mistakenly mixed up the diurons in their chemistry experiment.
meanings.sent4: The diurons in the solution danced together, creating a unique chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: The collection of diurons displayed a rainbow of colors under the microscope.
